snippet: The actress Ellen Page engaged Senator Ted Cruz in a four-minute discussion of same-sex marriage and gay rights as he was flipping burgers for fairgoers.
abstract: The actress Ellen Page engaged Senator Ted Cruz in a four-minute discussion of same-sex marriage and gay rights as he was flipping burgers for fairgoers.

headline.main: Ellen Page Confronts Ted Cruz at the Iowa State Fair

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
